mapper.insert: insert into user (id, userid, username, sex, password, phonenum, identify, email, education, birth_date, medical_no, remark, post_id_now, department_id_now, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phonenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{medicalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postIdNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentIdNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, identify = #{identify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, medical_no = #{medicalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_id_now = #{postIdNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_id_now = #{departmentIdNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userid, username, sex, password, phonenum, identify, email, education, birth_date, medical_no, remark, post_id_now, department_id_now, note_taker, record_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
